org.apache.jena.hadoop.rdf.io.registry

Interface WriterFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractQuadsOnlyWriterFactory, AbstractTriplesOnlyWriterFactory, AbstractWriterFactory, JsonLDWriterFactory, NQuadsWriterFactory, NTriplesWriterFactory, RdfJsonWriterFactory, RdfXmlWriterFactory, ThriftWriterFactory, TriGWriterFactory, TriXWriterFactory, TurtleWriterFactory

    public interface WriterFactory
    Interface for writer factories

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets whether this factory can produce writers that are capable of reading quads

      • canWriteQuads

        boolean canWriteQuads()
        Gets whether this factory can produce writers that are capable of reading quads
        Returns:
        True if quads can be read, false if not

      • canWriteTriples

        boolean canWriteTriples()
        Gets whether this factory can produce writers that are capable of reading triples
        Returns:
        True if triples can be read, false if not

                                                                             throws IOException
        Creates a quad writer

        writer - Writer
        config - Configuration
        Returns:
